verses.roman:
ei nīca deha mora paḍuka tava āge
ei vāñchā-siddhi mora tomātei lāge"

synonyms: ei—this; nīca—lowborn; deha—body; mora—my; paḍuka—let it fall down; tava āge—in front of You; ei—this; vāñchā-siddhi—perfection of desire; mora—my; tomātei—by You; lāge—can become possible.
translation: "Let this lowborn body fall down before You. You can make possible this perfection of all my desires."
